title: Given f'(x), how many relative maxima?

content.question: The derivative of f is <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>4</mn> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>âˆ’</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43BF@</annotation> </semantics> </math> .
